title: inspace
author: inspace
content: Hello, I'm looking for a competent person to manage our community here on the forum, as well as the sig campaign. We are interested in long-term cooperation.Please leave your resume here or send me a DM.

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: Check this: Overview of Bitcointalk Signature Anti-Spam Campaign ManagersSome notable managers I can think of..icopressHhampuzjulerz12Royse777joeperryDarkStar_CryptopreneurBrainbossThe CryptovatorLittle Mouseyahoo62278

comments.author: sujonali1819

comments.author: Pandorak
comments.body: The users below have a very good reputation, and as far as my observations, i see that a project will get more attention if they manage it.- Hhampuz- joeperry- Royse777- yahoo62278By the way, this is your project social media: https://twitter.com/inspacecoin ?

comments.author: worldofcoins
comments.body: Quote from: inspace on January 30, 2023, 03:10:49 PMSorry for the delay in replying but I was told that I can only reply once an hour.I've sent you a message,Also, please consider upgrading your account to copper membership to reduce the rate of PMs/DMS you can send and the various advantages of a member rank. including 90 sec wait time instead of 360 sec.Quote from: theymos on November 10, 2017, 09:23:30 PM- Your "you must wait ____ seconds between ___" counter is reduced by 75%. So if you're naturally of Newbie rank, you only have to wait 360-75% = 90 seconds.You can buy it here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=credit;promoteLink to copper membership: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=credit;promote

comments.author: inspace
comments.body: "if you're planning to hire 40 users then i can make it to 25% of the total amount.You're unable to send me message because you're limited to 6 minutes of sending message."worldofcoins, I received several offers from other users and their offers are 7 times cheaper than your offer. Can you explain why we have to pay you $3,000 a month? We pay our employees well, but it seems to me that you offer no more than other managers offer.

comments.author: worldofcoins
comments.body: Quote from: inspace on January 30, 2023, 04:11:05 PM"if you're planning to hire 40 users then i can make it to 25% of the total amount.You're unable to send me message because you're limited to 6 minutes of sending message."worldofcoins, I received several offers from other users and their offers are 7 times cheaper than your offer. Can you explain why we have to pay you $3,000 a month? We pay our employees well, but it seems to me that you offer no more than other managers offer.I think 25% is reasonable for my quality time dedicated to 40 users if you aren't happy then you can hire someone who's suitable for you.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: worldofcoins on January 30, 2023, 04:17:16 PMQuote from: inspace on January 30, 2023, 04:11:05 PM"if you're planning to hire 40 users then i can make it to 25% of the total amount.You're unable to send me message because you're limited to 6 minutes of sending message."worldofcoins, I received several offers from other users and their offers are 7 times cheaper than your offer. Can you explain why we have to pay you $3,000 a month? We pay our employees well, but it seems to me that you offer no more than other managers offer.I think 25% is reasonable for my quality time dedicated to 40 users if you aren't happy then you can hire someone who's suitable for you.I think you are on Crack buddy. I consider myself in the top 2 of managers on this forum and only charge a max of 15%. With my 15% the company gets my reputation and what that may bring to a project as well as me being the 7th most recognized name on this forum. Who are you? What have you done to command 35% lmao. Thank you for showing me the type of greedy scum that you are.@inspace, if you are paying in btc and not tokens, feel free to message me. I'm not as cheap as some managers, but I'm way more reputable then all other candidates.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: inspace on January 30, 2023, 02:30:26 PMHello, I'm looking for a competent person to manage our community here on the forum, as well as the sig campaign. We are interested in long-term cooperation.Please leave your resume here or send me a DM.I don't want to take risk to PM/DM on the forum so here I show my interest. Feel free to check my service page.Seven ongoing campaign (signature campaign) for seven different startups. Two bitcoin mixers, four crypto casinos and one file sharing platform. As side promotion I have few others too. I would love to help you to promote your project too.It needs a lot of discussion before even talking about the budget of a campaign. So feel free to reach out to me on my Telegram @Royse777, let's have a discussion and figure out what you need and what I can offer.Cheers,

comments.author: inspace
comments.body: "Hi, I am soon starting to manage campaigns here. I can manage your campaign for 10% of the total budget, as a special offer since it will be my first campaign".BenCodie, Please tell us your vision for the campaign. We are also interested in how it all works because some points are still not completely clear to us. Unfortunately, I can only send private messages twice a day, so I would appreciate an extensive answer so that I don't have to ask several times for incomprehensible details.

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: Quote from: inspace on January 30, 2023, 07:38:26 PM"Hi, I am soon starting to manage campaigns here. I can manage your campaign for 10% of the total budget, as a special offer since it will be my first campaign".Thats still a lot if its a high budget campaign. I guess some reputable managers would take far less than that. And also, never send funds first to a new manager or to one who is first timer. It might be risky , ; you must use escrow with them.Also, I have sent you my proposal just now as well. Although competition is tough, I hope you find the best manager for yourself

comments.author: pixie85
comments.body: Quote from: inspace on January 30, 2023, 07:38:26 PM"Hi, I am soon starting to manage campaigns here. I can manage your campaign for 10% of the total budget, as a special offer since it will be my first campaign".BenCodie, Please tell us your vision for the campaign. We are also interested in how it all works because some points are still not completely clear to us. Unfortunately, I can only send private messages twice a day, so I would appreciate an extensive answer so that I don't have to ask several times for incomprehensible details.I know everyone has to start at some point, but do you expect people to hire you when they have all these people with experience to choose from. What can you offer that they cannot? Why should participants trust you to pay them when you could run with the money at any time? 10% of the budget is a lot. A campaign that pays people $100 with 20 participants has a monthly budget of 8000 dollars, so you'd like to be paid 800 a month for a few hours of work. That's a good deal for a newbie, don't you think?

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: inspace on January 30, 2023, 07:38:26 PM"Hi, I am soon starting to manage campaigns here. I can manage your campaign for 10% of the total budget, as a special offer since it will be my first campaign".BenCodie, Please tell us your vision for the campaign. We are also interested in how it all works because some points are still not completely clear to us. Unfortunately, I can only send private messages twice a day, so I would appreciate an extensive answer so that I don't have to ask several times for incomprehensible details.Publicly replying to PMs is a very bad practice, consider buying a copper membership here on the forum, and you will increase the daily limit of sending PMs.also, several proven managers with a high reputation have already been recommended to you, maybe you can start from there, with the help of telegram for fast and more efficient communication. don't just go for the lowest offer.

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: How can users offer services or even base their fees on a percentage without knowing what the project and advertising budget is?Start with that: what are you advertising? If I like it, I'd like to manage a campaign (from my main account). If it's just another made up token you're promoting, I'm not interested.

comments.author: indah rezqi
comments.body: Quote from: inspace on January 30, 2023, 07:38:26 PMUnfortunately, I can only send private messages twice a day, so I would appreciate an extensive answer so that I don't have to ask several times for incomprehensible details.examplens has recommended you to buy copper member, find it here: Paid membershipsQuoteAvailable paid memberships:Copper - 0.00152868 BTC: Allows you to post images even if you are a newbie, reduces the time-between-actions limit, and provides some of the same benefits as being of natural Member rank.Other than that, I think all managers will be more than happy to reply and respond to you on telegram. Instead of just relying on PM forum, then I think you'll be free to discuss it on telegram. After all, you also don't go into any detail here about what you want to promote and be paid in what form, so discuss it with them there.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: inspace on January 30, 2023, 07:38:26 PM"Hi, I am soon starting to manage campaigns here. I can manage your campaign for 10% of the total budget, as a special offer since it will be my first campaign".BenCodie, Please tell us your vision for the campaign. We are also interested in how it all works because some points are still not completely clear to us. Unfortunately, I can only send private messages twice a day, so I would appreciate an extensive answer so that I don't have to ask several times for incomprehensible details.This should be in a private conversation every manager has their own ways of dealing with prospective clients, we are not in a contest on who has the best offer to manage your campaign, you can do two things, you leave your telegram handle or upgrade your account to copper account, this is to get the best of private conversations.You did not even mention what kind of project you are going to launch for a marketing campaign, so managers will have an idea of how to approach you.
